name: BomberBall
description:
CONTROLS:

1) WASD: To move and rotate the robots.

2) Spacebar: Drop a bomb (good robot) or mine (bad robot).

Disclaimer 01: First you play as the evil robot and then as the good robot.

Disclaimer 02: Recommended to play in Full Screen Mode.

=============================================================

This is my submission for the Mini Jam 111, which is all about colors. The creative limitation this time around was: "You are your own enemy".

We had three days and development of this project took about 10 hours.

For the time being, I provide you with one level, but if you want more, shout out to me and I might consider adding more levels.
